alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 7:45AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Montgomery affecting Dickinson County. .Runoff from heavy rain of 2 to 4 inches across Dickinson County earlier this week has resulted in flooding along upper portions of the Little Sioux River. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Montgomery. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1391.5 feet, 170th Avenue north of Highway 9 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 1391.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM CDT Sunday was 1391.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1391.0 feet. && Fld Observed Location Stg Stg Day/Time Little Sioux River Montgomery 1391.0 1391.4 Sun 7 AM &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 945 AM CDT.
